task_background: Prepare the insurance agency office for an important client visit by organizing, cleaning, and repairing various items.

tasks.task_description: Place the VIP Client Briefcase (vip_briefcase_1) on the Manager's Desk (managers_desk_1).
Place the Half-Eaten Samosa (samosa_1) in the Break Nook (break_nook).
Find the policy folder with the blue stamp (policy_folder_1) and file it in the Overstuffed Filing Cabinet (filing_cabinet_1).
Use the paperclip (paperclip_1) to open the VIP Client Briefcase (vip_briefcase_1).
Use the wrench (wrench_1) to tighten the Wheezing Air Conditioner (air_conditioner_1).
Use the pen (pen_1) to sign the Ledger Book (ledger_book_1) and then place it in the Manager's Office (managers_office).
Use the stapler (stapler_1) to staple the policy folder with the red stamp (policy_folder_2) and then file it in the Overstuffed Filing Cabinet (filing_cabinet_2).
Have robot_1 and robot_2 cooperate to open the Dusty Safe (safe_1).
Move the Industrial Shelving Unit (shelving_unit_1) to the Main Sales Floor (main_sales_floor).
Move the Faux-Mahogany Desk (managers_desk_1) to the Client Meeting Booth (client_meeting_booth).
Cooperatively move the Overstuffed Filing Cabinet (filing_cabinet_1) to the Back Storage Room (back_storage_room) and then use the duster (duster_1) to clean it.
Cooperatively move the Client Meeting Booth (client_meeting_booth_1) to the Manager's Office (managers_office) and then use the cleaning cloth (cleaning_cloth_1) to dust it.
